+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+(function ($) {
+    $(document).ready(function () {
+
+        // partnerslider
+        var swiper = new Swiper(".partnerslider", {
+            slidesPerView: "auto",
+            spaceBetween: 20,
+            loop: true,
+            speed: 6000,
+            allowTouchMove: false,
+            autoplay: {
+                delay: 1,
+                disableOnInteraction: false,
+            },
+        });
+
+    });
+}(jQuery));
+
+
+
+
